title: CFOP Beginners Algorithm Sheet for 3x3 4LLL | PDF DOWNLOAD
body_html:
Our Print-Friendly PDF Reference Sheet is the perfect companion for anyone starting the CFOP method. Designed with clarity and convenience in mind, this A4 Poster covers everything you need to solve the Last Layer of a 3x3 Rubik’s Cube using the Four-Look Last Layer (4LLL) technique.

What's Inside:

  1. OLL Edges: Orient the edges.
  2. OLL Corners: Solve corner orientation
  3. PLL Corners: Permute the corners.
  4. PLL Edges: Finish by aligning the edges for a solved cube.

This step-by-step guide organizes all the essential algorithms in a clean, easy-to-read format.

Features:

  • Digital Download: Receive your PDF instantly after checkout.
  • Print-Friendly Design: Save it on your device or print it for quick reference while you practice.
  • Comprehensive and Clear: Covers all algorithms needed for 4LLL with minimal clutter.

This is a PDF Download. Download link available after checkout is complete.

body_html:

title: How To Solve the 3x3 Rubik's Cube | 24 page Booklet PDF Download
body_html:
Learn how to solve the Rubik’s cube with this compact booklet. It contains 24 quality pages of tried and tested step-by-step instructions that will help you create the necessary solving foundation to build on later.

After years of testing and refining the methodology and instruction at our shop and cube hangouts and events, we believe this is the clearest and easiest instructions to learn how to solve the Rubik’s cube available on the internet.

The book includes:

  • Easy to Follow steps to solve using the beginners method
  • Introduction to Speedsolving 
  • Comprehensive diagrams and images
  • Cube Notation
  • Space allocated for Notes
  • QR Code to accompanying video tutorial

Size: A6 (11cmx15cm)

The author has been creating cube-solving aids for nearly a decade. The free PDF digital downloads on this site - “How to Solve the Rubik’s Cube” along with video instruction - are one of the top viewed learning aids on the internet. The author has developed and tested these instructions with students of all ages during hundreds of meetups and cube hangouts over the last eight years.

Specifically, this booklet combines many of our digital downloads into a single comprehensive guide. 

The required steps and moves to solve the Rubik’s cube are presented in a unique way to aid visual learning and steer away from more complicated formal notation found in other solving guides." 

Copyright © 2023 by Maxine Holder
All rights reserved.  No portion of this book may be reproduced in any form without written permission from the publisher or author.

title: How To Solve a 4x4 Cube Beginners Guide PDF DOWNLOAD
body_html:
We've created Print Friendly PDF that you can use whilst you are learning to solve the 4X4 Rubik's Cube.  

The instructions are on 2 x A4 pages and include comprehensive diagrams.

The instructions explains how to solve a 4x4 using the reduction method. You will need to know how to solve a 3x3 to do Part 3 of the solve. This tutorial assumes you already know how to solve a 3x3.

Parts Included:
1 - Solve the CENTERS
2 - Pair the EDGES
3 - Solve Parity

title: 3x3 Last Layer CFOP Foundation Solution | Print Friendly PDF Download
body_html:
This page explains an alternate method to solve the last layer of the Rubik’s cube.

The algorithms for this method is longer than the beginner method, BUT they are less repetitive, so you will solve the cube in less moves and ultimately be faster.

This method is the foundation of the last two steps of the CFOP speed solving method, where you orientate the last layer (OLL), then permutate the last layer (PLL) starting with the corners and finishing with the edges.

The Download link is available after checkout is complete.  Download link is also emailed to you. Future updates to this file will be available free of charge.

These instructions are also included in the "How To Solve the Rubik's Cube Compact Book"
